description:
tls: fix decoding of certLen in certificateMsg.unmarshal

certLen was decoded incorrectly if length > 2^16-1.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Thank you for that. However, I can't see that you've agreed to the contributors agreement: http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#copyright

I'm afraid that we need that, before accepting code, in order to keep our copyright ducks in a row.


Cheers

AGL

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=bcfa9fc88361 ***

crypto/tls: fix decoding of certLen in certificateMsg.unmarshal

certLen was decoded incorrectly if length > 2^16-1.

R=golang-dev, agl
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6197077

Committer: Adam Langley <agl@golang.org>

subject: code review 6197077: tls: fix decoding of certLen in certificateMsg.unmarshal
